data.name: ActEstadoNumerosEAR
data.value: UPDATE [@STR_EARAPRDET] SET U_ER_STDO = '?',U_ER_SLDO = '?' WHERE U_ER_EARN = '?' AND U_ER_NMER = '?'|UPDATE "@STR_EARAPRDET" SET "U_ER_STDO" = '?',"U_ER_SLDO" = '?' WHERE "U_ER_EARN" = '?' AND "U_ER_NMER" = '?'

data.name: ActualizarEstadoCreacion
data.value: UPDATE [@STR_EARCRGDET] SET U_ER_DEDC = '?',U_ER_ESTD = '?' WHERE DocEntry = '?' AND LineId IN (?)|UPDATE "@STR_EARCRGDET" SET "U_ER_DEDC" = '?',"U_ER_ESTD" = '?' WHERE "DocEntry" = '?' AND "LineId" IN (?)

data.name: AgruparLineasEAR
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_AgruparLineasEAR '?','?','?','?','?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_AgruparLineasEAR( '?','?','?','?','?')

data.name: GenerarCodigoEAR
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_GenerarCodigo_CCH_EAR '?','?'|CALL STR_SP_GenerarCodigo_CCH_EAR('?','?')

data.name: GenerarDocumentoXML
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_Create_OPCH_XML'?','?','?'|CALL STR_SP_CREATE_OPCH_XML('?','?','?')

data.name: ObtCuentadeBancoPropio
data.value: SELECT GLAccount,(SELECT ActCurr FROM OACT WHERE AcctCode=GLAccount),(SELECT AcctName FROM OACT WHERE AcctCode=GLAccount) FROM DSC1 WHERE BankCode = '?' AND Account = '?'|SELECT "GLAccount",(SELECT "ActCurr" FROM OACT WHERE "AcctCode"="GLAccount"),(SELECT "AcctName" FROM OACT WHERE "AcctCode"="GLAccount") FROM DSC1 WHERE "BankCode" = '?' AND "Account" = '?'

data.name: ObtCuentasdeBanco
data.value: SELECT T0.Account,T1.ActCurr FROM DSC1 T0 INNER JOIN OACT T1 ON T0.GLAccount = T1.AcctCode WHERE BankCode ='?' AND ActCurr = '?'|SELECT T0."Account",T1."ActCurr" FROM DSC1 T0 INNER JOIN OACT T1 ON T0."GLAccount" = T1."AcctCode" WHERE "BankCode" ='?' AND "ActCurr" = '?'

data.name: ObtListadeBancos
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT T0.BankCode,BankName FROM ODSC T0 INNER JOIN DSC1 T1 ON T0.BankCode = T1.BankCode inner join OACT T3 ON T1.GLAccount = T3.AcctCode WHERE T3.Postable = 'Y'|SELECT DISTINCT T0."BankCode","BankName" FROM ODSC T0 INNER JOIN DSC1 T1 ON T0."BankCode" = T1."BankCode" INNER JOIN OACT T3 ON T1."GLAccount" = T3."AcctCode" WHERE T3."Postable" = 'Y'

data.name: ObtListaSolicitudesEAR
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_ListarSolicitudesEntregaRendir '?','?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_ListarSolicitudesEntregaRendir('?','?')

data.name: ObtMontoApertura
data.value: SELECT U_ER_MNAP FROM [@STR_EARAPRDET] WHERE U_ER_EARN = '?' AND U_ER_NMER = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_MNAP" FROM "@STR_EARAPRDET" WHERE "U_ER_EARN" = '?' AND "U_ER_NMER" = '?'

data.name: ObtNumerosdeEntregaaRendirActivos
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_NumerosEntregaaRendirActivos '?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_NumerosEntregaaRendirActivos('?')

data.name: ObtPagosPorNumerodeEAR
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_PagosRealizadosPorNumero_CCH_EAR '?','?','?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_PagosRealizadosPorNumero_CCH_EAR('?','?','?')

data.name: ObtSaldoEntregasaRendir
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_SaldoNumerosEntregaaRendir '?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_SaldoNumerosEntregaaRendir('?')

data.name: ObtTotalesXCarga
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_InfoTotalesPorCargaDocumentosEAR '?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_InfoTotalesPorCargaDocumentosEAR ('?')

data.name: ObtTransIdPagoaCuenta
data.value: SELECT T3.TransId FROM [@STR_EARAPR] T0 INNER JOIN [@STR_EARAPRDET] T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OVPM T3 ON T3.DocEntry = U_ER_DEPE WHERE T1.U_ER_EARN = '?' AND T1.U_ER_NMER = '?'|SELECT T3."TransId" FROM "@STR_EARAPR" T0 INNER JOIN "@STR_EARAPRDET" T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry" INNER JOIN OVPM T3 ON T3."DocEntry" = "U_ER_DEPE" WHERE T1."U_ER_EARN" = '?' AND T1."U_ER_NMER" = '?'

data.name: ValidarCargaEAR
data.value: SELECT U_ER_SCRG FROM [@STR_HEMEAR] WHERE U_empID = '?' AND U_ER_CDUS = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_SCRG" FROM "@STR_HEMEAR" WHERE "U_empID" = '?' AND "U_ER_CDUS" = '?'

data.name: ValidarContabEAR
data.value: SELECT U_ER_SCNT FROM [@STR_HEMEAR] WHERE U_ER_CDUS = '?' AND U_empID = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_SCNT" FROM "@STR_HEMEAR" WHERE "U_ER_CDUS" = '?' AND "U_empID" = '?'

data.name: VerificarCantidadNrosEAR
data.value: SELECT COUNT('A') FROM [@STR_EARCRG] WHERE U_ER_NMRO = '?'|SELECT COUNT('A') FROM "@STR_EARCRG" WHERE "U_ER_NMRO" = '?'

data.name: VerificarEstadoySaldoNroEAR
data.value: SELECT U_ER_SLDO,U_ER_STDO FROM [@STR_EARAPRDET] WHERE U_ER_EARN = '?' AND U_ER_NMER = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_SLDO","U_ER_STDO" FROM "@STR_EARAPRDET" WHERE "U_ER_EARN" = '?' AND "U_ER_NMER" = '?'

data.name: GenerarCodigoUnicoPorTU
data.value: SELECT 'E'+RIGHT('0000'+LTRIM(RIGHT(ISNULL(MAX(Code),0),4)+1),4) AS Code FROM [?]$SELECT 'E'|| RIGHT('0000'||LTRIM(RIGHT(IFNULL(MAX("Code"),'0'),4)+1),4) FROM "?"

data.name: EliminarRegistrosTU
data.value: DELETE FROM [?] WHERE ? = '?'|DELETE FROM "?" WHERE "?" = '?'

data.name: ObtDimensionesXDefecto
data.value: SELECT U_ER_DFLT FROM [@STR_HEMEAR2] WHERE U_empID = '?' AND U_ER_NMBR = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_DFLT" FROM "@STR_HEMEAR2" WHERE "U_empID" = '?' AND "U_ER_NMBR" = '?'

data.name: ObtAsientoCompensacion
data.value: SELECT TOP 1 TransId FROM OJDT WHERE U_BPP_CtaTdoc = '?' AND U_BPP_DocKeyDest = '?'|SELECT TOP 1 "TransId" FROM OJDT WHERE "U_BPP_CtaTdoc" = '?' AND "U_BPP_DocKeyDest" = '?'

data.name: ObtCodigoCtaPte
data.value: SELECT TOP 1 AcctCode FROM OACT WHERE FormatCode = '?'|SELECT TOP 1 "AcctCode" FROM OACT WHERE "FormatCode" = '?'

data.name: ObtDocumentosaReconciliar
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_DocumentosaReconciliar '?','?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_DocumentosaReconciliar('?','?')

data.name: VerificarProveedorAsociado
data.value: SELECT empID,U_CE_PVAS FROM OHEM WHERE U_CE_PVAS IS NOT NULL|SELECT "empID","U_CE_PVAS" FROM OHEM WHERE "U_CE_PVAS" IS NOT NULL

data.name: ValidarCerrarCargaEAR
data.value: SELECT U_ER_SCCR FROM [@STR_HEMEAR] WHERE U_empID = '?' AND U_ER_CDUS = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_SCCR" FROM "@STR_HEMEAR" WHERE "U_empID" = '?' AND "U_ER_CDUS" = '?'

data.name: ValidarRegularizarSaldosEAR
data.value: SELECT U_ER_SRGL FROM [@STR_HEMEAR] WHERE U_empID = '?' AND U_ER_CDUS = '?'|SELECT "U_ER_SRGL" FROM "@STR_HEMEAR" WHERE "U_empID" = '?' AND "U_ER_CDUS" = '?'

data.name: ObtImpuesto
data.value: SELECT "Rate" FROM OSTC WHERE "Code" = '?' | SELECT "Rate" FROM OSTC WHERE "Code" = '?'

data.name: ObtTipoCambio
data.value: SELECT "Rate" FROM ORTT WHERE "RateDate" = '?' AND "Currency" = '?' | SELECT "Rate" FROM ORTT WHERE "RateDate" = '?' AND "Currency" = '?'

data.name: ObtTotalesXActualizacion
data.value: EXEC STR_SP_LOC_InfoTotalesPorParametroEAR '?','?','?','?','?'|CALL STR_SP_LOC_InfoTotalesPorParametroEAR('?','?','?','?','?')
